queries.select: select t.tipospesa, t.evento, t.dettagli, t.data, t.entrata, t.totale, u.nome as utente from (select s.data, (s.prezzo * isnull(s.quantita, 1)) as totale, 'Scontrino' + ' - ' + isnull(t.tipospesa, '') as tipospesa, isnull(s.pezzo, '') as dettagli, isnull(t.entrata, 0) as entrata, isnull(e.evento, '') as evento, s.idutente from spese s left join tipispesa t on t.idtipospesa = s.idtipospesa left join eventi e on e.idevento = s.idevento union select b.data, isnull(b.prezzo, 0) - isnull(b.rimborso, 0) as totale, 'Bollette' as tipospesa, tb.tipobolletta as dettagli, 0 as entrata, '' as evento, b.IDUtente from Bollette b join TipiBolletta tb on tb.IDTipoBolletta = b.idtipobolletta union select r.data, prezzo, 'Rifornimenti Auto' as tipo, '' as dettagli, 0 as entrata, '' as evento, a.idutente from RifornimentoAuto r join [auto] a on a.IDAuto = r.IDAuto union select m.data, isnull(prezzo, 0) - isnull(rimborso, 0) as totale, 'Manutenzioni Auto' as tipospesa, oa.operazioneauto + isnull(' - ' + m.[note], '') as dettagli, 0 as entrata, '' as evento, a.idutente from ManutenzioneAuto m join OperazioniAuto oa on oa.IDOperazioneAuto = m.IDOperazioneAuto join [auto] a on a.IDAuto = m.IDAuto) t left join utenti u on u.idutente = t.idutente where t.data is not null and isnull(t.totale, 0) <> 0 and t.idutente in ({@method='info',string:userVisibility}) and ('{@qrypar='neg'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='neg'}' = '1' and t.entrata = 0)) and ('{@qrypar='from'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='from'}' <> '' and t.data >= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='from'}', 112))) and ('{@qrypar='to'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='to'}' <> '' and t.data <= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='to'}', 112)))
